synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with DMF three times per day for three days, then with anhydrous acetone three times per day for three days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Supercritical CO2 drying followed by evacuation for 10 h at 100 °C under 30 mTorr
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Needle shape single crystals were obtained as a second phase but couldn't be characterized due to poor diffraction.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Evacuation for 10 h at 120 °C under 30 mTorr
